name: Cassandra Ashford (n√©e Meridian)
family: Born to Meridian family; married into Ashford
title: Lady Paramount of Celestia
core_wound: Forced into loveless political marriage at 22; gave up the man she loved (a common-born ship captain) to fulfill family duty; has lived with regret for 30 years
wants: To break free from the suffocating aristocratic system and create a more equitable society
needs: To find the courage to be authentic and stop living for others' expectations
voice_markers: Speaks with refined eloquence but occasionally lets slip colloquialisms from her youth
Uses poetic metaphors and references to nature (from agricultural homeworld)
Laughs rarely but genuinely when she does
Tends to ask pointed questions rather than make statements
Says 'how curious' when she's actually angry
contradiction: Publicly plays the perfect aristocratic wife while secretly funding reformist movements; despises the system while benefiting from its privileges
physical_description: Elegant and poised with auburn hair and green eyes. Longevity treatments maintain her beauty. Favors flowing gowns in deep greens and golds. Has a warm smile she rarely shows in public.

relationships.Lysander_Ashford: Husband; respects his intelligence but resents being treated as a political asset rather than a person; has long since stopped trying to connect emotionally
relationships.Marcus_Ashford: Son; loves him but worried his father's grooming has made him rigid; tries to encourage his independent thinking
relationships.Victoria_Ashford: Daughter; her favorite; sees herself in Victoria and wants better for her than a political marriage
relationships.Thane_Rourke: Her lost love from 30 years ago; she gave him up to marry Lysander; doesn't know he's still alive and working as a cargo captain
relationships.Elena_Navarro: Friend and secret ally in the reformist movement; one of the few people who knows the real Cassandra
relationships.Dmitri_Volkov: Secret negotiating partner; working with him behind Lysander's back to prevent war between their families

secrets: Secretly funding reformist political movements through untraceable accounts
Meeting in secret with Elena Navarro to plan social reforms
Still thinks about Thane Rourke and wonders what life could have been
Has been negotiating with Dmitri Volkov to arrange a marriage between Victoria and Dmitri's son to forge peace
Knows about Lysander's illegitimate daughter and has been anonymously helping her
knowledge_state: Aware of growing social unrest and sympathetic to it
Knows Lysander is hiding health issues
Suspects Marcus is not as loyal to his father as he appears
Does not know that Thane Rourke is still alive and will arrive at Celestia Prime soon
